ProductInfo.Features:
32" HD LCD TV with Digital ATSC and Clear-QAM Tuners.
Comes with: Power Cord. Remote Control w/batteries. Base. User's Manual.
Size Visaul 31.5" Viewable, Diagonal. Resolution Widescreen 1366x768, 16. Brightness 500 cd/m2 (typ). Contrast Ratio 20000;1(DCR), 2000;1 (typ).
Response Time 6.5ms Gray-Gray (typ). Viewing Angle(CR more than 5) Horizontal; 178 Degrees - Vertical; 178 Degrees. TV Tuning ATSC (8VSB), Clear-QAM. Sound System MTS + SAP.
Closed Caption Yes. V-Chip Parental Control Yes. Video Inputs 3-HDMI, 2-Composite + L/R Audio, 2-S-Video + L/R Audio, 2-Component YCbCr/YPbPr + L/R Audio. Graphic (PC) Input Analog RGB (Dsub), Maximum Resolution 1360x768x60Hz.
ProductInfo.Name: AOC 32 INCH HD LCD TV With Digital ATSC&Clear-QAM Tuners Multiple Composite Component Inputs
